about_the_game:
This is a demo (beta) version

Various changes may be made in the final version.

I’m developing this game with the aim of making it easy to play again and again.
If you find any bugs or problems with the game, please contact me through SNS or Discord.
I’m hoping to have a multiplayer environment in the future, but the situation is subject to change.

About this game

.This is an action game where you just aim for the top with simple actions. This action game does not have a save button! Aim for the goal (rescue Kon) at once.
Various enemies and gimmicks will come in your way. When that happens...

Change

You can transform yourself into a unique character by "changing." You can use a full range of different characters to push forward in a favorable situation.

Story

Kon the fox and Pon the raccoon dog are best friends!
One day, Kon was kidnapped by a bad guy after getting involved in a little incident after finding a green puffy thing in the mountains.

The bad guy's hideout is far in the sky, and you have to somehow get there and rescue your best friend Kon from the bad guy!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i7-4770 / AMD FX 8310
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 660 / AMD Radeon HD 7870
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: A casual action game in which you control Pon, a raccoon dog, as he continues his journey up the mountain and beyond!You can change your character's appearance to make him more unique! Changechange" as often as you can to gain an advantage!
